Doc-No. 15746508   15/AUG/2024 (THU)  10:29  (+0200)  DV
Visser & Visser Chartering BV - Vlaardingen (NL)
Phone : +31 10 4115620
Good day
Please propose for:
MV Rubato  -  WC Italy (Gaeta) 25/26 August
- last cargo alu ingots
- geared sid bc
- blt 2010 japan
- liberia flag
- 25.159 dwat on 9.998m ssw
- loa 158.15 m / beam 24.00 m
- gt 15243 / nt 8954
- 4 holds / hatches
- 4 X 30 mts cranes
- 1.170.842 cbft grain / 1.105.380 cbft bale
- mech ventilation / co 2 ftd
- ballast: abt 13 kn on abt 20,00 mts vlsfo 380 cst
laden: abt 12.5 kn on abt 23,00 mts vlsfo 380 cst
in port abt 2.5 mts vlsfo idle / abt 5 mts working
++
Any direction ww incl fronthaul, Venezuela ok.
(no USA, Iran, Aussie, NZ)
Pls ppose firm & fixable biz,
Thanks and best regards
Dirk VISSER - ph +31104115620
Mob/What's app     +31653143975 / skype  dirk.visservisser
